---
title: "testing"
format: html
editor: visual
---


```{r}
naturtyper <- readRDS(paste0(path, "naturtyper.rds"))
```

```{r}
temp <- naturtyper %>%
  group_by(kartleggingsar) %>%
  summarise(count = n())
```

```{r}
ggplot(temp, aes(x = kartleggingsar, y = count))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity",
           fill = "grey80",
           colour = "grey20",
           size=1.5)+
  theme_bw(base_size = 12)
```
